knimeNode.name: Ungroup
knimeNode.shortDescription: Creates for each list of collection values a list of rows with the values of the collection in one column and all other columns given from the original row.

fullDescription.intro: Creates for each list of collection values a list of rows with the values of the collection in one column and all other columns given from the original row. Rows with an empty collection are skipped, as well as rows that contain only missing values in the collection cell with the 'Skip missing values' option enabled.
fullDescription.option: Add the collection columns to ungroup to the include list.
The selected collection column will be removed from the result table, if this option is ticked.
If enabled, rows with a missing value in all selected collection columns are skipped, as well as missing values in a collection cell if they occur in all selected collection columns.

If enabled, the hiliting of a input row results in hilting all rows (given in the collection cell) of the ungrouped output table vs. if all output rows (represented in or more collection cell) the input row(s) are hilit as well. Depending on the number of rows, enabling this feature might consume a lot of memory.
